tool_description: This API calculates the simple interest, compound interest, investment returns, return on investment, capital gains tax, and annual percentage yield of an investment based on the input parameters.
name: CalcX - Investment API
title: CalcX - Investment API

api_list.name: GET - Calculate Investment
api_list.description: This endpoint performs multiple investment calculations in a single request. It accepts a list of investment parameters, such as principal amount, rate of return, time period, and compounding frequency, and returns a list of investment results, including the simple interest, compound interest, investment returns, return on investment, capital gains tax, and annual percentage yield of each investment.

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: The interest rate of the investment

required_parameters.name: time
required_parameters.description: The length of the investment in months

optional_parameters.name: compounding
optional_parameters.description: The frequency of compounding interest. Valid options are **yearly**, **semi-annually**, **quarterly**, and **monthly**. Default is **yearly**

optional_parameters.name: in_currency
optional_parameters.description:
The currency of the investment. Default is USD

Currencies currently supported include:
Currency	Code	Name
NOK	kr	Norwegian Krone
EUR	€	Euro
HKD	$	Hong Kong Dollar
CZK	Kč	Czech Koruna
THB	฿	Thai Baht
CHF	CHF	Swiss Franc
USD	$	US Dollar
ISK	kr	Icelandic Króna
GBP	£	British Pound Sterling
JPY	¥	Japanese Yen
BGN	лв	Bulgarian Lev
CNY	¥	Chinese Yuan
IDR	Rp	Indonesian Rupiah
TRY	₺	Turkish Lira
NZD	$	New Zealand Dollar
SGD	$	Singapore Dollar
DKK	kr	Danish Krone
AUD	$	Australian Dollar
BRL	R$	Brazilian Real
ILS	₪	Israeli Shekel
SEK	kr	Swedish Krona
CAD	$	Canadian Dollar
HUF	Ft	Hungarian Forint
ZAR	R	South African Rand
MYR	RM	Malaysian Ringgit
KRW	₩	South Korean Won
MXN	$	Mexican Peso
INR	₹	Indian Rupee
PHP	₱	Philippine Peso
PLN	zł	Polish Zloty
RON	lei	Romanian Leu

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Whether to format the result. Valid options are **yes** and **no**. Default is **yes**

optional_parameters.name: to_currency
optional_parameters.description:
The currency to convert the result to. Default is USD

Currencies currently supported include:
Currency	Code	Name
NOK	kr	Norwegian Krone
EUR	€	Euro
HKD	$	Hong Kong Dollar
CZK	Kč	Czech Koruna
